评论详情: This is literally my fav hoodie it is so worth it and I hope u found this helpful. One thing to know about this you should get a size lower cus I’m usually a size M, but got this in a size S and was just a little big, but after washing it was perfect.

This hoodie is so cute!! It’s thick, but not bulky. It’s still very moveable and creates the perfect baggy look. The quality is really nice and the material is really smooth to the touch. I will say, I wore this out in about 27F weather and I was still cold. (I only wore the hoodie, nothing else.) So it’s not the WARMEST but still decent. I prefer when they aren’t super heavy.  I’m 5’7 and 140lbs, i’m on the slimmer side and in tops I usually wear an x small to medium (depending on the shirt) and I got a medium. The fit was perfect for my body. If you do like it a little extra baggy i’d say get a large. But the medium works beautifully for me!  My only things I noticed that may bug some people is that it didn’t have drawstrings in the hood and the hood itself when it laid on my head almost looked like a elf hood 😂 Those things didn't bother me that much though, but I thought i’d mention it. Overall this is such a great hoodie! i’ll definitely purchase more things from this brand.
Great shirt, well made and cute. Very happy with it.

I ordered a size small ( i normally would get a medium) and it fit like an xl or L. I’m really upset that I wasted my money on this.

When looking to order this hoodie i was slightly concerned hearing about all of the sizing differences so i hope this helps. i’m 5’3 110 pounds and typically in women’s hoodies for and oversized fit i choose a large but for this hoodie do NOT get your normal oversized fit. with reading and measuring i decided to go with an XS and it fits AMAZING!! when the bottom of the hoodie is rolled up it rests right below my hip bone (i have longer legs than torso) so if you want a really oversized and are about the same as me i would say Small but a fitted oversized XS. i also heard some people say about the inside not being soft. yes its not your typical hoodie interior no fluff or anything but it is not itchy at all or uncomfortable. Very good quality i love this hoodie and hope this helps!! :)
